snippet: Bill de Blasio, the Democratic nominee for New York mayor, collected roughly $635,000 in the last two weeks of September.
abstract: New York City mayoral candidate Bill de Blasio raised roughly $635,000 from September 17 to 30, after his win in Democratic primary; pace of de Blasio's fundraising outstripped that of rival Joseph J Lhota following release of public polls showing de Blasio with 40-point lead.
lead_paragraph: Bill de Blasio, the Democratic nominee for New York mayor, collected roughly $635,000 in the last two weeks of September.

headline.main: Fund-Raising for de Blasio Soars, Aided by Big Lead in Polls
headline.print_headline: Fund-Raising for de Blasio Soars, Aided by Big Lead in Polls
